Ultrasound-guided transversus abdominis plane quadratus lumborum block treat postoperative pain . Postoperative pain measure visual-analogue scale ( VAS ) . 1 , 2 , 6 month surgery patient call assess neuropathic pain Neuropathic Pain Symptom Inventory ( NPSI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Pain-treatment Techniques After Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Written consent obtain cesarean section . Only subarachnoidally anaesthetised patient may participate study . Pencil-point spinal needle bupivacaine ( Marcaine Heavy Spinal 0.5 % ) use . At end surgery ultrasound-guided regional block perform . Each patient randomly allocate one treat group : transversus abdominis plane block ( TAP ) quadratus lumborum ( QL ) . Patients receive 0.2 mL local anesthetic solution ( 0.25 % bupivacaine ) side . Postoperative pain measure VAS ( visual-analogue scale ) 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 24 hour end operation . Paracetamol , metamizol , ketoprofen may give require . Whenever pain exceed 40 ( VAS ) 5 mg morphine give intravenously ( maximum two dosage per day ) . 1 , 3 , 6 month patient call assess neuropathic pain . Neuropathic Pain Symptom Inventory ( NPSI ) use .
DOC.criteria: obtain consent singleton pregnancy subarachnoid anaesthesia coagulopathy allergy local anesthetic depression , antidepressant drug treatment epilepsy usage painkiller surgery addiction alcohol recreational drug
